DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial investigate whether drug safe , well tolerated investigate efficacy NNC 0070-0002-0182 treatment obesity . The subject treat drug placebo . This registration cover phase 2 part combine phase 1/phase 2 trial ( phase 1 part trial conduct November 2007 April 2008 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Efficacy , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics NNC 0070-0002-0182 Overweight Obese Male Female Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 30.039.0 kg/m2 ( obese ) Females consent use double barrier method contraception , postmenopausal old 50 year , total hysterectomy Clinically significant disease Blood pressure great 140/90 mmHg Evidence depression Recent diet attempt , treatment diet drug ( within 3 month ) Liposuction surgery weight loss within last year Evidence eating disorder ( bulimia , binge eat ) Restricted diet ( Kosher , vegetarian ) Smoker history drug alcohol abuse Females childbearing potential : positive pregnancy test
